morla.title: RDF Documents
morla.subtitle: How to surf between the RDF triples

section.p: A web browser works with HTML pages and it permits you to surf between the links. Morla can do it with the RDF triples so you can use this software if you want see the RDF document like links between subjects, properties and objects.
With normal click, you can surf the RDF Documents like web pages, open URIs with a web browser, open these URIs into morla, new tabs, new windows, etc. etc. etc...
The morla's navigator suppots history, multi tabs, and the common functions of a normal web browser.
